pages.title: Further Enhancements
pages.text: Vault Gear can be further enhanced by certain items, namely $(#033dfc)Gear Charms$(), $(#033dfc)Flawed Rubies$() and $(#033dfc)Vault Plating$(), these can tier up your Vault Gear, add an additional Level to Vault Gear or increase its base durability.
$(#033dfc)Gear Charms$(), may be used to increase the tier of the Vault Gear to the corresponding Gear Charm, these can be crafted or obtained in $(#033dfc)Treasure Chests$().

$(#033dfc)Flawed Rubies$() are used to give you a chance at increasing your Levels on Gear pieces by one, but they also have a chance to do nothing or $(#ff0000)completly destroy$() the Gear Piece. These can be obtained by $(#033dfc)Treasure Goblins$(), $(#033dfc)Treasure Chests$() & $(#033dfc)Gilded Chests$()

$(#033dfc)Vault Plating$(), can be used to increase durability by +50 for a max of 20 applied Vault Plating. Vault Plating is $(#033dfc)tiered$() and requires the corresponding Vault Gear Tier to be applied to the Vault Gear Piece.
